Laredo.XEWL-AM:
XEWL-AM (branded as La Romántica) is an AM daytime-only radio station that serves the Laredo, Texas, United States and Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas, Mexico border area. XEWL-AM broadcasts on the AM frequency of 1090 kHz.
The station signed on in 1950 as XERG-AM and changed its callsign in 1959.
